subject: Invoice for Stokes Cabin
body:
Hello Frank Thomas,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Stokes Cabin): for a total of $161.50. The work took place between Aug 25, 2022 and Sep 02, 2022.

Details


Stokes Cabin: 1 invoice totaling $161.50


Invoice #5 for $161.50
Days Worked
Aug 25, 2022 5hr 59min,
Sep 02, 2022 4hr 47min


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $161.50



Thank You,
Greg Goad Construction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
